Observation Details:

Structural Curtain Walls
Curtain Wall External Checklist
Setout / grids/ datum lines (refer to Survey mark/Setting out) MUST ATTACHED SURVEY DRAWING SHOWING LEVELS AND SLAB EDGES
Opening acceptance as per drawings MUST ADD SURVEY DRAWING
Secondary Bracket Installed, Bolt torque Mark with paint marker when toqued(refer to SD)
Waterproofing ( Check that water proofing is over area where airseal is going to be) PHOTO REQUIRED
Install subsill /Jamb/ Deadload blocks/ splicers / soakers
Splices,Top Angle fitted & soakers sealed - PHOTO REQUIRED
All Fixings over sealed PHOTO REQUIRED
Ensure no packers visable out of line where airseal is to be installed.
Install backer rod - PHOTO REQUIRED
Complete airseal within application time allowed
Install panels as per drawings -PHOTO REQUIRED
Install glazing rubber with correct orientation/ no breaks and full height between panel and frame
External flashings / weather seals installed and SEALED if drawing indicates
Curtain Wall Internal Checklist
Airseal and internal flashings
Ensure no packers visable out of line where airseal is to be installed.
Panel locked off position as per module
Crusifix sealing done on panel to panel cross joints?
Internal fire seal and trunking
PGI Galv. Z support clips installed
PGI fire insulation installed
Trims and closers (smoke seal)
Blind Box installed
Sill Trunking Installed
Vertical Trunking Installed
Fins
Horizontal & Vertical Fins Installed
Fin bolts tight and locked off as per drawings
Glass
Glass installed and no damaged glass
Wight Aluminium sign off
Trade clean / protected
All elements completed correctly as per specification, reviewed and approved
Raise Remedial / Request Signoff

Steel structure acceptance
Install glazing channels

Fit head and sill angle for glazing support
Flashing and air seals
Check backing rubber correctly positioned
Caps fitted (by glazer)
Cover caps fitted (by glazer)
Trade clean
Wight Aluminium sign off
All elements completed correctly as per specification, reviewed and approved

Sealant application
